attributes.action: Bring to justice, politicians knowingly lying to voters.
attributes.additional_details: Politicians often intentionally and knowingly lie to voters ,make up figures to accelerate their political careers and achieve their goals.A good example of such process is recent EU referendum, where two Leave campaign leaders knowingly mislead and knowingly lied to voters regarding immigration, '£350mln savings from leaving the EU'.The cost of such populism will be paid by tax payers - the voters.Knowingly lying in trade is an offence, it should in politics too.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to implement a rule that politicians intentionally and knowingly lying  their voters  to archive their political ambitions are brought to justice.
